::Spears::

She looked at Ramulas. "Look, I'll understand, just let me know if 
you still want me or not.  Sure I get a little wild at time, but I'm 
not all bad." She did want to stay in the group.  It had been a long 
while since she had friends and wanted to have friends again.  But 
she would also follow the wishes of Ramulas if he said for her to 
leave.
